meanings.definition: A person who buys goods or services.
meanings.sent1: The vendees were excited to explore the new products at the store.
meanings.sent2: The vendees paid for their items at the checkout counter.
meanings.sent3: The vendees joked about buying the entire store just for fun.
meanings.sent4: In the world of shopping, vendees are the kings and queens of decision-making.
meanings.sent5: The vendees carefully selected their purchases, making sure to get the best deals.

meanings.definition: The buyer of property or goods.
meanings.sent1: After much negotiation, the vendees finally agreed on the price of the house.
meanings.sent2: The vendees signed the contract to officially become the new owners.
meanings.sent3: The vendees celebrated their purchase with a toast and big smiles.
meanings.sent4: As vendees of antique furniture, they had a keen eye for quality and craftsmanship.
meanings.sent5: The vendees inspected every detail of the property before making their decision.
